trans-unit.source: The newsletter alias is a unique reference to the newsletter which can be called instead of its numeric ID.
trans-unit.target: L'alias dal newsletter è ina referenza unica che po vegnir utilisada empè da l'ID numerica.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the HTML content of the newsletter. Use the wildcard ##email## to insert the recipient's e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus endatar il cuntegn da HTML dal newsletter. Utilisar il tegnaplazza ##email## per inserir l'adressa dad e-mail dal destinatur.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the text content of the newsletter. Use the wildcard ##email## to insert the recipient's e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus endatar il cuntegn da text dal newsletter. Utilisar il tegnaplazza ##email## per inserir l'adressa dad e-mail dal destinatur.

trans-unit.source: Attach one or more files to the newsletter.
trans-unit.target: Agiuntar al newsletter ina u pliras agiuntas.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the files to be attached from the files directory.
trans-unit.target: Tscherner las datotecas che duain vegnir agiuntadas.

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose the e-mail template.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus tscherner il template per l'e-mail.

trans-unit.source: Send the newsletter as plain text e-mail without the HTML content.
trans-unit.target: Trametter il newsletter be sco text senza cuntegn da HTML.

trans-unit.source: Do not embed images in HTML newsletters.
trans-unit.target: Betg integrar maletgs externs en newsletters da HTML.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the sender's name.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus endatar il num dal speditur.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a custom sender address.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus inditgar l'adressa dad e-mail dal speditur.

trans-unit.source: The sending process is split into several cycles to prevent the script from timing out.
trans-unit.target: Il process da trametter ils e-mails vegn dividì en differents ciclus per evitar in time-out dal script.

trans-unit.source: Here you can modify the waiting time between each cycle to control the number of e-mails per minute.
trans-unit.target: Qua pudais vus modifitgar il temp da spetga tranter ils ciclus per controllar il numer dad e-mails per minuta.

trans-unit.source: In case the sending process is interrupted, you can enter a numeric offset here to continue with a particular recipient. You can check how many mails have been sent in the system/logs/newsletter_*.log file. E.g., if 120 mails have been sent, enter "120" to continue with the 121st recipient (counting starts at 0).
trans-unit.target: En cas ch'il process da trametter vegn interrut, pudais vus endatar qua in offset numeric per cuntinuar cun in destinatur particular. Vus pudais controllar quants e-mails ch'èn vegnids tramess en la datoteca system/logs/newsletter_*.log. Sche p.ex. 120 e-mails èn vegnids tramess, endatai "120" per cuntinuar cun il 121avel destinatur (i vegn quintà davent da 0).

trans-unit.source: Send the preview of the newsletter to this e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Trametter la prevista dal newsletter a questa adressa.

trans-unit.source: The newsletter has been sent to %s recipients.
trans-unit.target: Il newsletter è vegnì tramess a %s destinaturs.

trans-unit.source: %s invalid e-mail address(es) has/have been disabled (see system log).
trans-unit.target: %s adressas dad e-mail nunvalidas èn vegnidas deactivadas (guardar il protocol dal sistem).

trans-unit.source: There are no active subscribers to the channel.
trans-unit.target: I n'existan nagins abunents activs per quest chanal

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to send the newsletter?
trans-unit.target: Vulais vus propi trametter il newsletter?

trans-unit.source: Show the details of newsletter ID %s
trans-unit.target: Mussar ils detagls dal newsletter cun l'ID %s
Encollar suenter il newsletter cun l'ID %s
